title: House committee hears testimony on DC health data breach
description: A top administrator with Washington’s health insurance exchange apologized to House members on Wednesday for the data breach that resulted in the disclosure of personal information for thousands of users, including members of Congress

title: California city audits police who sent racist, abusive texts
description: A California city voted Tuesday to audit its troubled police department after racist text messages sent by officers were made public earlier this month

title: Why parts of America are 'certainly in a water crisis' and what can be done about it
description: As pollution, engineering, population growth and climate change pose challenges to freshwater quality and quantity, the safety and amount of tap water is in question.

title: Tornado watch issued throughout 6 states in the Heartland
description: A tornado watch has been issued for portions of six states in the Heartland through 11 p.m. CDT Wednesday.

title: Does motive make a difference in the Pentagon leak case? Experts weigh in
description: Reports have indicated suspect Jack Teixeira was driven to share classified documents to impress friends he made on the messenger platform Discord.

title: Home Depot employee fatally shot while confronting alleged shoplifter
description: A 26-year-old Home Depot employee was fatally shot after confronting an alleged shoplifter armed with a handgun at a California store, authorities said.

title: Trump adviser Boris Epshteyn set to be interviewed by special counsel probing Jan. 6
description: Trump adviser Boris Epshteyn is scheduled to meet Thursday with the special counsel probing former President Trump's attempt to overturn the 2020 election, sources say.

title: WATCH:  Watch 101 skydivers form record-breaking snowflake formation
description: The skydivers, ages 60 to 80, set two new records, according to the Skydivers Over Sixty organization.

title: Trump's former financial chief Weisselberg gets out of jail
description: The former chief financial officer at Donald Trump’s company is out of jail after serving around three months for tax evasion

title: Supreme Court extends stay on Texas abortion pill ruling until Friday
description: Justice Alito's temporary stay on the abortion pill issue was set to expire at the end of Wednesday.

title: NYC parking garage in deadly collapse to be demolished
description: A New York City parking garage that partially collapsed on Tuesday will carefully be demolished as investigators search for the cause of the deadly incident.

title: US sending $325 million in more military aid to Ukraine
description: The U.S. is sending Ukraine about $325 million in additional military aid, including an enormous amount of artillery rounds and ammunition as the launch of the spring offensive against Russian forces approaches

title: Facebook parent Meta to slash 10,000 employees
description: CEO Mark Zuckerberg described the cuts as part of Meta's "Year of Efficiency."

title: 'Tennessee three' to visit Biden at White House next week
description: Three Tennessee lawmakers who faced expulsion votes after participating in gun protests will visit the White House on Monday

title: WATCH:  Giant panda shows off her skills at Malaysia zoo
description: Giant panda Sheng Yi shows off her skills in front of visitors at the National Zoo of Malaysia, including climbing trees and walking over a log bridge.

title: Tyre Nichols' mother sues city of Memphis, police over his death
description: Tyre Nichols' mother has sued the city of Memphis and police officers over his death following a violent traffic stop in the city.

title: Ralph Yarl making stunning recovery, family lawyer says
description: The attorney for Ralph Yarl's family says the Black teenager who was shot in head by a white homeowner at point-blank range miraculously survived the bullet to his skull

title: Otis Redding III, who followed father into music, dies at 59
description: Singer and guitarist Otis Redding III has died at age 59

title: So-called 'Don't Say Gay' rules expanded through 12th grade in Florida
description: The Florida Board of Education approved a rule that limits classroom instruction on sexual orientation and gender identity. It expands the so-called 'Don't Say Gay' law.

title: 2 arrested in shooting at birthday party that killed 4
description: Two teenagers have been arrested in connection with a shooting that killed four people at a birthday party in Alabama over the weekend.

title: Supreme Court lets Texas death row inmate pursue DNA lawsuit
description: The Supreme Court has ruled that longtime Texas death row inmate Rodney Reed should have a chance to argue for testing of crime-scene evidence that he says will help clear him

title: Arizona boy hospitalized twice before death in state care
description: An autopsy report released this month says a 9-year-old boy in the care of Arizona's child welfare agency was hospitalized twice for a life-threatening complication of diabetes before he died Dec. 26

title: Tesla cuts U.S. prices again ahead of 1Q earnings release
description: Tesla dropped the starting prices for its two top-selling models overnight, the company’s fourth price U.S. price cut this year

title: US-made Patriot guided missile systems arrive in Ukraine
description: Ukraine’s defense minister says his country has received U

title: Charges put focus on Jehovah's Witnesses' handling of abuse
description: A Pennsylvania grand jury in recent months accused nine men with connections to the Jehovah’s Witnesses of child sexual abuse in what some consider the nation’s most comprehensive investigation yet into abuse within the faith

title: DeSantis appointees begin reshaping Disney World's district
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis’ appointees are trying to reshape Disney World’s governing body with proposals to eliminate a planning board and prohibit mask mandates

title: Fox settlement a 'big step forward in democracy,' Dominion CEO says
description: Dominion Voting Systems CEO John Poulos joined George Stephanopoulos on "Good Morning America" on Wednesday following his company's settlement with Fox.

title: UK says Russian hackers aim to attack key infrastructure
description: U.K. officials say Russian hackers are seeking to “disrupt or destroy” Britain’s critical infrastructure and not enough is being done to stop them

title: Colorado gun control bills progress; semi-auto ban unlikely
description: Colorado lawmakers have pushed forward a slew of aggressive gun control bills that are nearing the governor’s desk for signatures

title: Chinese panda on long-term loan to Thailand dies suddenly
description: The animal was due to return home in six months.

title: WATCH:  High school classmates hold ‘Unity Walk’ to show support for Ralph Yarl
description: Students at Staley High School in Kansas City held a "Unity Walk" to show support for their classmate Ralph Yarl, who was shot last week after authorities say he accidentally went to the wrong address to pick up his siblings.

title: WATCH:  Python hitches a ride with farmer
description: This Australian farmer doesn’t seem too alarmed by the python that decided to join him for a morning ride.

title: Strong earthquake shakes Papua New Guinea
description: A strong earthquake has shaken Papua New Guinea but no serious damage or casualties are expected

title: Reports: Tesla factory where worker died had safety weakness
description: News reports say Chinese authorities concluded Tesla Inc.’s Shanghai factory where an employee died in a Feb. 4 accident has weaknesses in its safety measures

title: In South Sudan, a new front line of climate change after historic flooding
description: "ABC World News Tonight" anchor David Muir and his team traveled to South Sudan to report on yet another front line of the climate crisis.

title: Suspect in classified document leak due back in court
description: Jack Teixeira, 21, "improperly and unlawfully retained and transmitted national defense information to people not authorized to receive it."

title: 3 school kids hospitalized after finding and ingesting suspected methamphetamine
description: Three children have been hospitalized after falling sick when they found and ingested a container of what they thought to be candy.

title: 2 Texas cheerleaders shot after getting into wrong car in parking lot
description: Two Texas cheerleaders were shot after one of them said they had mistakenly got into the wrong vehicle in a parking lot early Tuesday morning.

title: 5 indicted in NY for scheme to drug, kill and rob men
description: A grand jury indictment unsealed Tuesday names five men in connection to the drugging deaths of the two men as part of a criminal operation to steal money

title: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon to be deposed in Epstein suit
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. CEO Jamie Dimon must undergo up to two days of questioning by lawyers handling lawsuits over whether the bank can be held liable in financier Jeffrey Epstein's sexual abuse of teenage girls and women

title: 1st Black chief judge for New York state confirmed
description: New York’s Senate confirmed Rowan Wilson as the state’s first Black chief judge

title: Southwestern US rivers get boost from winter snowpack
description: Forecasters with the National Weather Service are delivering good news for cities and farmers who depend on two major rivers in the southwestern U.S. The headwaters of the Rio Grande and the Pecos River recorded some of the best snowfall in years
